title: Xing Da Xing Donghua Xilie Zhi Taikong Chuan
synopsis: Little Star Cat is a cute little cat with a big star pattern on her chest; while Shining is a real little star. A chance encounter made them close friends. One day, Shining wanted to look back in the sky, so Little Star Cat and the residents of Qixing Town started to build a spaceship. The universe is so big. Little Star Cat, Shining, and the residents of Qixing Town traveled in space by spacecraft, the moon, Mercury, Uranus, Mars, Saturn, and the residents of Qixing Town not only met many new friends during their travels. , Also learned a lot of scientific knowledge.(translated from youku)

details.Japanese: 星达兴动画系列之太空船

title: Xing Mao Wenhua Da Jiangtang Minjian Chuanqi Zhi Fengshenbang
synopsis: It is based on many outstanding Chinese legends and is adapted from the comic works of Mr. Cai Zhizhong, such as "Feng Shen Bang", "White Snake" and "Dragon Girl". We present these well-known stories to a wide audience in the form of animation, so that more audiences will be familiar with these treasures. (translated from youku)

title: Xing Mao Katong Tiandi
synopsis: This film is based on excellent fairy tales and novels at home and abroad. It consists of four animations: "Happy Prince", "Night of the Galaxy Railway", "MR.WIN" and "The Little Prince". We put these animations together so that more children and viewers can feel their charm. (translated from youku)

title: Xing Mao Katong Tiandi season2
synopsis: Based on excellent fairy tales and novels at home and abroad, it is composed of three animations: "The Adventures of Urchin," "The Metamorphosis", and "A Midsummer Night's Dream". The young Huck was given a sum of money hidden in the cave by the bandits Encountered kidnapping, through the eyes of a thirteen or fourteen-year-old child, he described the corruption of the bourgeois lifestyle and the sins of slavery. In Metamorphosis, the absurd plot of a small employee turned into a big beetle is used to reveal the relationship between people. At the same time, the surface is affectionate, but the inside is extremely lonely and unfamiliar. "A Midsummer Night's Dream" is William Shakespeare’s famous comedy adaptation of the story. After a lot of ups and downs, the last two rebuilt the old one. The faithful presentation of the animation allows the audience to understand, recognize and cultivate correct concepts in laughter. (translated from youku)

details.Japanese: 星猫卡通天地 第二季

title: Xing Mao Wenhua Da Jiangtang Minjian Chuanqi Zhi Baishe Chuan
synopsis: Adapted from Cai Zhizhong’s over 30 million excellent comics sold in more than 30 million copies, selecting the essence of ancient Chinese sages such as Confucius, Mencius, Laozi, Zhuangzi, Liezi, etc., using two-dimensional rendering technology to interpret the magnificent chapters of ancient Chinese sages, in an easy-to-understand manner , Vivid and lively forms of expression reproduce the extensive and profound ancient culture of Chinese scholars. A new interpretation of this animated TV series that every Chinese must watch. (translated from youku)

details.Japanese: 星猫文化大讲堂民间传奇之白蛇传

title: Xing Mao Wenhua Da Jiangtang Minjian Chuanqi Zhi Long Nu
synopsis: It is based on many outstanding Chinese legends and is adapted from the comic works of Mr. Cai Zhizhong, such as "Feng Shen Bang", "White Snake" and "Dragon Girl". We present these well-known stories to a wide audience in the form of animation, so that more audiences will be familiar with these treasures. (translated from youku)

title: Xing Mao Wenhua Da Jiangtang Zhi Minjian Gushi
synopsis: "Star Cat Culture Lecture Hall-Folk Tales" is based on many outstanding Chinese legends, from Mr. Cai Zhizhong’s comic works "Feng Shen Bang", "White Snake", "Nie Yinniang", "Dragon Girl", "Ghost Fox Fairy" and " "The Strange Story of the Six Dynasties" is adapted from six comics. We present these six well-known stories to a large number of TV audiences in the form of animation, so that more audiences are familiar with these treasures.(translated from iqiyi)

details.Japanese: 星猫文化大讲堂之民间故事

title: Xing Mao Wenhua Da Jiangtang Zhi Wenhua Gushi
synopsis: The Star Cat Cultural Lecture Hall makes cultural stories entertaining and makes cartoon animations, and the classics are transformed into vernacular and comics with a flowing brush. He retains the rich cultural heritage of Chinese traditional culture, philosophical and humorous.(translated from iqiyi)

details.Japanese: 星猫文化大讲堂之文化故事

He retains the rich cultural heritage of Chinese traditional culture, philosophical and humorous. (translated from iqiyi)

details.Japanese: 星猫文化大讲堂之名著故事

title: Dai Jia Jia
synopsis: "Once upon a time there was a planet, there was a dull town on the planet, and a dull home in the dull town..." This is the lively and interesting dull home series we recommend to children. The story takes place in the simple folk town of Duizhen, where there live such a family: Dad, Dad, Dabao, and puppy Dae Ben'er. Every day, there are whimsical ideas, clumsy cuteness, and fun. (translated from douban)
background: This anime aired in 2012.This anime won The 26th China TV Golden Eagle Awards Excellent Animation

title: RABBYCC Zhi Ka Luo De Xinling Shijie
synopsis: Carol Carol is a caring and optimistic girl. She likes to use a small diary every night to write down the inspiration that day. In this animation, Carol Tell the audience in the form of short stories and principles, inspirational and warm principles, get inspiration from life, and get positive energy from this animation! (translated from baidu baike)

title: Mengxiang Zhi Lu
synopsis: The busy first semester of Dream Academy ended with the bell of the final exam. Ling Zhen accidentally found a piece of parchment with a mysterious place marked on it. The students of Magic Class A decided to travel there. During the trip, Yaya touched the iconic stele of Muyin Town, and everyone was sucked into another space. Following the map markers, Ling Zhen and others found the missing Douzi, Lei Guang, Teacher Ma Zhi and others, and helped the villages and towns passing by to solve the problems, and obtained five mysterious gifts. Finally, they followed the signs to the mysterious man. In the little hut, the mysterious man asked Ling Zhen to open five mysterious gifts. It turned out that these five gifts are the five gems that represent courage, wisdom, unity, friendship, and confidence. With the help of the mysterious person, the people who gathered 5 gems returned to reality. They united and loved each other more and cherished their friendship. (translated from douban)

title: Mengxiang Xue Yuan
synopsis: It tells the story of 13-year-old Ling Zhen, Jing Jing, Yaya and others studying in the huge dream school, and accidentally encountered a series of secrets hidden in the school: the back mountain forbidden area, the highest medal, the legend of the treasure map, the night raid "Mask Man" and so on. The clever and brave friends worked together to dig out the truth, and finally found out that some evil forces were unruly towards the treasures of the school. As a result, they joined forces with teachers, police and evil forces to fight wit and courage, and finally won victory and honor. (translated from baidu baike)

title: Chaoji Fei Xia
synopsis: In the ordinary world, heroes are needed to defend justice. This time, it is Super Flying Man! (translated from douban)

title: Chaoji Fei Xia season2
synopsis: "Super Flying Man 2" tells the story of the airplane robot Le Di and a group of friends called "Super Flying Man" traveling around the world, delivering packages to the children and helping them solve their difficulties. The biggest feature of the work is that each episode takes place in a different city. It uses exquisite pictures to show the world's diverse cultures, such as scenic spots, architecture, languages, festivals, and food. The story conveys kindness, bravery, joy and friendship, allowing children to follow Ledi in every new magical journey, broaden their horizons and realize the colorful and colorful home of the earth. (translated from douban)

title: Chaoji Fei Xia season3
synopsis: In the ordinary world, heroes are needed to defend justice. This time, it is Super Flying Man! (translated from douban)

title: Davara no Densetsu
synopsis: Everything starts with Aras taking his face and putting it on during his visit to the Basilica Cistern, where he went on a school trip. With the wearing of the ring, the powers of Davara, a lofty communication, pass to Aras.

title: Chaoji Fei Xia season4
synopsis: In the fourth season of Super Flying Man, the overall tone is vibrant and full of positive energy. While continuing the advantages of the story mode of the first three seasons, it also adds more vivid characters and rich storylines. The story content of this film is dominated by unit dramas. In each episode, the protagonist Le Di will fly to different areas around the world to deliver packages to children in need, and the audience will follow Le Di to shuttle around the world to watch Super Flying Man They use their extraordinary abilities to help each child solve difficulties. At the same time, the film will also present cultural characteristics from all over the world, such as local common words, understanding local famous food, unique and famous sports, interesting customs, etc. Through this cartoon, children can feel happiness from it, expand their understanding of cultures around the world, and learn the beautiful qualities of unity, friendship, enthusiasm and kindness, mutual help and growth together.(translated from douban)

title: Chaoji Fei Xia season5
synopsis: The content of this cartoon is based on unit dramas. In each episode, the anthropomorphic aircraft protagonist Le Di will fly to different areas around the world to deliver the packages they need to the children, so the audience will follow Le Di to shuttle Around the world, watch the Super Flying Man team use their team’s extraordinary ability to help children solve their difficulties. (translated from douban)

title: Chaoji Fei Xia season6
synopsis: Super flying man, bravely break into the world! The sixth season of Super Flying Man is here! The tone of the new season is full of vitality and positive energy. The content of this cartoon is based on unit dramas. In each episode, the anthropomorphic aircraft protagonist Le Di will fly to different areas around the world to deliver the packages they need to the children, so the audience will follow Le Di to shuttle From all over the world, watch the Super Flying Man team use their superior ability to help children (translated from douban)

title: Chaoji Fei Xia season7
synopsis: season7 of it

title: Chaoji Fei Xia season8
synopsis: In this season of "Super Flying Man 8", Ledi will continue to carry out the task of delivering customized packages with his partners, travel to more places in the world, complete more challenges, and bring more interesting stories. Through this cartoon, children can feel happiness from it, and at the same time enhance their understanding and understanding of cultures around the world, and learn the wonderful qualities of Super Flying Man and children such as unity, friendship, fear of difficulties, enthusiasm and kindness, and mutual help. ! (translated from douban)

title: Chaoji Fei Xia season9
synopsis: In the new first season, the story will revolve around super pets. Every Super Pan has his own super pet! At all times, they perform tasks together and face difficulties together. In addition, this season there are two new super flying heroes to join, they are the super car Lake, and optimistic and love to sing Pepe. There is also an unprecedented mischief-Kim Boy! He will bring a great challenge to Super Flying Man, because he always wants to prove that he is a better plane than Super Flying Man. Their joining will bring more novel and interesting elements to the story, let us take a look!(translated from douban)

title: Chan Yi
synopsis: What is health? Health is the perfect harmony of body and mind. Whenever the mind and body are in disharmony, illness or discomfort will appear. People's emotions control behavior and thoughts, whether it is good emotions or bad emotions, if it is not given a chance to express, emotions will turn into incentives that damage health. Should we correct the emotional imbalance? How do we know that we are healthy? Why do health problems seem to be endless, and there are always new health problems? Dr. Deepak Dudhmande from India and the Central Committee The TV station Shinco Animation Channel launched a health-preserving themed column "Zen Medicine" to answer the mysteries of health in the form of animation humorously. (translated from douban)

title: Menghuan Maomi Wu
synopsis: There is a special "dream cat house" on Xingfu Street, which contains cat toys collected from all over the world. This film revolves around the cute cat toy "Liu Li" in "Dream Cat House" and its cat toy friends. In a beautiful and warm mood like a fairy tale, we will tell the audience the twists and turns of the cat toys. And the stories of their former owners, sharing various funny or touching stories when the cat toys get along. (translated from douban)

title: Lao Kai De Qihuan Tanxian Zhi Lu
synopsis: Legend has it that in the ancient forest, there was a mysterious tribe living on the backs of snails. There were stone steles inscribed with magical words. The codes on the steles could open the gate of the country of nine cats. The explorer Lao Kai, the frog long feet, the field mouse Yoyo, and the parrot Xiao Hei gathered together and formed an alliance with their respective goals and marched towards the mysterious country of nine cats. (translated from baidu baike)

title: Xi Hang Zongdongyuan Zhi Loulan Chuanqi
synopsis: The story takes place in the distant ancient city of Loulan, where people live and work in peace and contentment. The Sand Demon led his men to attack the ancient city of Loulan. Princess Loulan took the initiative to ask Ying to go to Ruoqiang, seeking help from the Red Date God, and ran into a young Han Chinese on the road to Ruoqiang. After arriving in Ruoqiang, I learned that the elves were injured and needed to gather five gems to restore the magical power of the red jujube elves, defeat the desert, and save Loulan. (translated from douban)

details.Japanese: 西行总动员之楼兰传奇

title: Xiong Hai Zi Anquan Xiao Jiangtang
synopsis: Safety common sense videos are carefully produced by the professional team of Ruitong Internet who has been engaged in preschool education for many years. In terms of content, we combine the reasonable suggestions of preschool education experts to carefully select valuable safety knowledge points according to the physical and psychological characteristics of children aged 3-6 years and integrate them into an interesting and philosophical storyline, and provide children with behavior and behavior in animation scenes. Psychological influence imperceptibly.(translated from douban)

title: Xiong Hai Zi Dizi Gui
synopsis: The Chinese Studies video is based on the Langlang Education enlightenment textbooks of Langlang Chinese Studies, carefully produced by the professional team of Ruitong Internet who has been engaged in the preschool education industry for many years. It basically covers the classic content required by the preschool children's Chinese learning. By learning the classics of Chinese learning, children can feel the traditional culture. The literary background of the book, develop potential, perfect character, establish self-confidence, fraternity, positive life and ideals, and further understand the principles of being in the world, so that children can absorb the nutrition and wisdom of Chinese learning in listening and watching. (translated from douban)

title: Xiong Haizi Sanzijing
synopsis: The Chinese Studies video is based on the Langlang Education enlightenment textbooks of Langlang Chinese Studies, carefully produced by the professional team of Ruitong Internet who has been engaged in the preschool education industry for many years. title: Guai Guai Pinyin Lixian Ji season2
synopsis: The Chinese version of Dora loves adventure! Teach children to learn Pinyin cartoons! Turn Pinyin into little monsters with different personalities. By telling interesting stories between the Pinyin little monsters and the Xiongzi family, guide children to recognize Pinyin, practice four-tone pronunciation, and understand writing standards, making the boring Pinyin learning vivid and interesting , And can cultivate children’s true, kind and beautiful character (translated from iqiyi)

details.Japanese: 怪怪拼音历险记第二季

title: Bing Ji Chaoren Kuaidi Xia
synopsis: "Class C Superman Express" is a story about the grassroots Superman Express, under the leadership of the direct leader, Lao Wang, who follows the procedures of the Superman Employment Association, fights against evil forces in a healthy and orderly manner, and benefits the society, and continues to struggle. (translated from douban)

title: Bing Ji Chaoren Kuaidi Xia season2
synopsis: In the middle of the 21st century, human beings ushered in the superpower revolution, and Superman became the star of the new era. The world has entered a new era. Madiu, a courier without superpowers, somehow broke out with superpowers, was somehow involved in a crisis, and somehow joined the Superman Association. In short, this is a very inexplicable magical reality story. (translated from douban)

details.Japanese: 丙级超人快递侠 第二季

title: Kuaidi Xia Waizhuan
synopsis: "Express Man Gaiden" is a special extra story derived from the original work of Salted Egg Animation "Class C Superman Courier Man". The painting style is ghostly and the style is very different, bringing you extraordinary enjoyment! (translated from douban)

title: Menghuan Bu Bu Xing
synopsis: The film tells about two children, Xiao Cong and You You, who accidentally discovered Bobo who fell to the earth due to insufficient energy in the spacecraft. In order to help Bobo store enough energy to restart the spacecraft and fly back to their planet, Cong and Yoyo Started a enthusiastic and helpful journey to help Bubu collect the knowledge and transform energy of the earth. The three children traveled from the land to the bottom of the sea to the jungle. They saw all sorts of novel things, learned a lot of scientific and cultural knowledge, and gained a wealth of life philosophy. (translated from douban)

title: Ha Pi Fuzi
synopsis: "Happy Father and Son" tells a hilarious and warm story between a pair of canned fathers and sons with special shapes and different personalities-Father Har and Son. One of them is funny and thrilling, and the other is smart and playful. The father and son walked side by side through fantasy worlds such as supermarket apartments, orchard homes, garbage islands, refrigerator castles, etc., leaving behind a string of witty stories; Pi son's ghost ideas kept getting into trouble, causing dad The head is full of bubbles; Papa Ha makes a small invention for Pi son, Pi son makes strange tricks for Papa Ha. Pi's son learns health knowledge, and Ha's father strengthens environmental awareness. Ordinary and novel stories make people laugh for a while, surprise for a while, and infiltrate the deep blood and affection between father and son in hilarious laughter... (translated from douban)

title: Ha Pi Fuzi Chao Neng Pao Dan
synopsis: "Super Bubble Egg" is a new work of "Happy Father and Son". 　　 New hapi new atmosphere! This time, the Harpy story will center on the "Super Drinks" with novel and diverse functions; all kinds of cute and interesting beverage parents and children will become the protagonists of the story. 　　 Supermarket City is a modern metropolis, but the living space is getting smaller and smaller, the energy utilization is getting more and more tense, and the environment is getting worse and worse, which brings a lot of inconvenience to the daily life of beverage citizens. Energy-saving “super-energy drinks” solve various problems encountered in everyone's life one by one. 　　At the same time, the Flanking Bucket Thief also brought his robot daughter, Water Egg Egg, and tried every means to steal super drinks. A super drink war is about to begin... (translated from douban)

title: Ha Pi Fuzi Fan Zhuan Pao Dan
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

title: Ha Pi Fuzi Yu Shui Jingang
synopsis: "Happy Father and Son and Water King Kong" was jointly produced by Wuxi Happy Animation Company and Jiangsu Guangxi Film and Television Animation Media Company. Two cartoons of this series have been produced, and the response has been strong after being broadcast continuously on CCTV and regional channels in China. The Cannes Autumn International Television Festival is launching the "Hapi Father and Son and Water King Kong" series 3. The plot story takes the protection of water resources as the theme and creates the image of "Water King Kong". He is a pure and lovely spring-eyed spirit. The resulting environmental pollution and uncontrolled use have become violent. The changes in "Water King Kong" have made people understand the importance of protecting nature and water resources, repent of their mistakes, and start actions. (translated from douban)

title: Muzhi Xiong Kangji
synopsis: This is a story about a little teddy bear and his partners, including fruit candy, chocolate, jelly and biscuits... the interesting life between them will be highlighted. 　　 There are many picture books, toys and dolls in one room. This room is for a five-year-old girl who likes to paint and a one-year-old boy who likes chocolate candy. One day, a beautiful thumb bear appeared among toys and candies. This was a yellow bear with goggles on his head and a small school bag with a bottle cap on his back. His name was Kang Ji. 　　 Kangji slept in a big shoe. He had a good time with his friends. These include sweet and sour fruit candies, lollipops that like to fight, honey that is always gushing and chocolate beans full of curiosity. For Kang Ji and his friends, all the toys and objects in the room are too big and impressive! So, the curious Kang Ji and his friends went on expeditions everywhere, and the various stories and their laughter that happened between the partners surrounded this little baby room... (translated from douban)

title: Ha Pu Yijia
synopsis: In ancient times, creatures appeared on a remote and mysterious planet. These creatures have gradually evolved into two major factions, one is a civilized race with green skin, and the other is an animal race headed by the giant beast Poppy. The two major races feed on energy bubbles produced on the planet, and live friendly and peaceful lives in their homeland called "Xiao Zheng Xing". 　　 Time flies, and Xiao Zheng Xing gradually dries up, and there are fewer and fewer places to generate energy bubbles. In order to survive, the two major factions competed with each other for bubble resources, which led to the acceleration of Xiaozheng's decline, and even began to experience huge natural disasters such as volcanic eruptions and ground collapse. When Xiao Zheng Xing was in danger, he was fortunate to encounter the "emergency family". 　　 In order to resolve the dispute between Xiao Zheng Xing, the Harp family embarked on a fascinating adventure.(translated from douban)

title: Koushui Liang Shan
synopsis: Once upon a time there was a good mountain, and a group of heroes gathered on the mountain. They were enthusiastic and bold, armed with special skills, and with the spirit of chivalry and justice, walking an unusual path. Saliva Liangshan records the daily hilarious life on Liangshan. Watch how this group of "good guys" who specialize in fighting and drinking can be self-sufficient, jumpy, healthy and happy on a mountain...m.77mi.cc随 As time progresses, new partners go up the mountain one by one, and the large family has more people, and the landscape on the mountain will become more complicated. The stories of the extraordinary cottages of the leaders and off-line people are full of vitality. All sorts of surprises and shocks that are radiant and unbelievable... Pictures of Liangshan Moushui · · · · · ·(translated from douban)

title: Kuaile Dongxi
synopsis: The 60-episode animated sitcom "Happy Things" is based on the description of the family life of a pair of twin brothers and sisters in the hutongs of old Beijing in China. The characters in the story have distinctive personalities, strong life atmosphere, and an approachable sitcom with a relaxed and natural style. While laughing outrageously, the film highlights the unique concepts of family, friendship and love of Chinese people, so that people can realize the true meaning of life while laughing out loud. (translated from douban)

title: Kuaile Xiao Dongxi
synopsis: Happy little things describe the happy life of the old Dong family who lived in the hutong in the 1980s. This era is the era when we grew up, and it is also the most prosperous era for the happy family. This era, let the 70s and 80s be born The people of people eagerly remember and are very nostalgic, but also let the children now see the freshness. In Xiaodong Xiaoxi of the same age, they feel the children's innocence and fun, and experience the topics that they pay attention to: school, exams, spring outings, Get along with your family, celebrate the New Year, and celebrate the holidays. The happy life of ordinary people in the hutongs in the 1980s is concentrated here (translated from douban)

details.Japanese: 歪说四大名著之歪说红楼

title: Feng Hua Xianzi Waizhuan
synopsis: The heavenly fairy "Fairy Wind Flower" has no interest in the work in the heavenly court, but has a soft spot for all things in the world. One day, "Fairy Fenghua" sneaked into the world without work and accidentally crushed the "Crimson Pearl Immortal Grass" who was practicing during his nap. Taking this opportunity, Tiangong Group's general manager "Li Tianwang" avenged his personal revenge and demoted the "Fairy Wind Flower" to the world. "Fairy Fenghua" was reincarnated and reborn in a wealthy family. The child was born with a jade in his mouth and named "Zhao Yu". At the same time, the revenge "Crimson Pearl Immortal Grass" was also reincarnated and reincarnated into the world. He was born in a poor family named "Yang Huanzhu" and moved into Zhao's house in disguise to seek revenge. It’s not that "Zhao Yu" is deeply in love with "Yang Huanzhu". "Yang Huanzhu" is also gradually moved by "Zhao Yu". "Li Tianwang" and party feather "Giant Spirit God" have always What will happen to the fate of the two fairies if the "Zhao Yu" who has been reincarnated by "Fairy Wind Flower" is unscrupulous? It’s all in the Chinese costume hilarious animation series "Fairy Flower Fairy Gaiden"... 　　 This play involves more than one hundred main characters, with a wonderful interpretation of the character and destiny, and injects fashion elements. The plot is relaxed, the dialogue is funny, and the story scene spans. Tiangong, ancient and modern, and integrated into popular events and languages, interprets the twists and turns of the four families of Zhao, Qian, Sun and Li in a relaxed way... 　　"Fairy Flower Fairy Biography" is its cartoon following the classic funny Another comedy masterpiece after the play "Happy Things", subverts the traditional way of funny.(translated from douban)

title: Qing píng chuánshuō zhī dào tú
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

title: Yuncai Mianbao
synopsis: One rainy morning, a small cloud hung on the treetops. The curious children found the strange cloud and carefully brought it to their mother. Mother used this cloud to bake some very delicious bread. The children ate the bread and began to float in the air like clouds. When the children brought cloud-made bread to their father who was at work, their thoughts were revealed, and father would never miss breakfast. ()traslated from douban

title: Yuncai Mianbao2
synopsis: Cat sisters and brothers Hongbei and Hongxi can fly after eating cloud bread. Many childish and educational stories happened between them and their families and partners. Dongji Town is immersed in an atmosphere of happiness, friendship and harmony every day.(translated from douban)

title: Mu Mu Buluo
synopsis: As we all know, Shanghai Fine Arts Film Studio participated in the creation of a large number of stop-motion animation works, but due to its production cost and time-consuming, few animation companies set foot in this field. After that, stop-motion animation in China was in a silent state. Fortunately, After more than 20 years, a handful of stop-motion animation companies, such as Puppets, Stop-motion Culture, Jiangtong Animation, and Punctuality Cartoon, have restarted their businesses, and have achieved good results, such as the 52-episode original puppet animation created by Stop-motion Culture The series "Mu Mu Tribe" was created by taking more than 500,000 photos in three years. The film tells the story of an ancient and mysterious village of insect elves in a hidden corner of the forest, where babies of insect elves live happily in the forest. story. This work is a silent film. There is no dialogue. The communication between insect elves and babies is done through body language such as gestures and gestures. Due to its excellent production, the film signed agreements with exhibitors from five countries including Spain, Sweden, Finland, Croatia and Belgium at the Cannes Autumn TV Festival in France in October 2012. According to the agreement, before the end of 2012, this 52-episode original animation will be exported to five European countries and will be shown on screen the following year.(translated from douban)

title: Mu Mu Buluo season2

title: Tianyan
synopsis: The film tells the story of a boy from an alien planet who, due to accidental reasons, arrives at the home of the earth girl Xiang Ling and uses his superman magic to help Xiang Ling and her classmates realize their dreams and solve problems, but they also make a series of jokes. The film is rich in imagination and fully adapts to the innocent psychological characteristics of children. A sunshine boy with a sense of justice, innocence and kindness comes from a distant and magical planet of Sky Eye. He has a magical sky eye that can transform and play different roles, and can also help others fulfill some wishes. He and the children of the earth shared a happy childhood story, so that the children can understand the charm of science without knowing it, and learn the way of being kind, honest, and loving.(translated from douban)

title: Tianyan Xiao Shentong
synopsis: Tianyan, a boy from the Three Eyes planet, came to the earth for a holiday survey, and happened to fall into the home of a 10-year-old girl Xiangling in the fourth grade of elementary school. Xiangling's mother opened an ice cream shop, and the ice cream she made became Tianyan's favorite. In the hearts of Xiangling's father and mother, Tianyan is just a cute kitten. Only Xiangling and his friends Zhen Meili, Xu Bowen, and Wu Guanjun know the origin of Tianyan. (translated form douban)

title: Tianyan Xiao Shentong season2
synopsis: Tianyan, a boy from Three Eyes planet, came to the earth for a holiday survey, and happened to fall into the home of a 10-year-old girl Xiangling in the fourth grade of elementary school. Xiangling's mother opened an ice cream shop, and the ice cream made became Tianyan's favorite In the hearts of Xiangling's father and mother, Tianyan is just a cute kitten. Only Xiangling and his friends Zhen Meili, Xu Bowen and Wu Guanjun know the origin of Tianyan. (translated from douban)

title: Tianyan You Qi Zhao
synopsis: "The Eyes of the Sky" tells the story of the eyes of a child from another planet. He is a sunny, innocent and kind-hearted boy with a sense of justice. He has a magical celestial eye that can transform, play different roles, and help others accomplish what they want to do. A series of interesting stories happened between them. (translated from baidu baike)

title: Congming Xiao Tianyan
synopsis: Summer school is about to start. 10-year-old girl Xiangling is still rushing for summer homework, hoping that Meteor can fulfill her wish and help complete her homework. At the same time, Ai Xiang, a young man from SkyEyes, has just gone to Earth for a summer vacation. When he reached the earth, it was like a shooting star across the night sky. A ridiculous encounter, two children from different planets met. Ai Xiang hoped that Xiangling would help complete the summer homework—the earth expedition, and Xiangling also said about the current dilemma.(translated form douban)

title: Tian Yanshen Hu
synopsis: The Tianyan Tiger comes from the Tianyan planet and possesses divine power. I heard that the people on earth have no magic power and want to come to the earth to show off, like Tianyan, to be a superstar on the earth. The opportunity finally arrived. Dead Skin Lai’s face followed Tianyan and came to the earth. Although he never thought ice cream was delicious, he accidentally ate Xiangling’s brown candy. She was shameless not to look back at the planet. He was determined to be a guest of Xiangling’s family and promised Xiangling. Mom and Dad’s faces pretend to be soft toys. Tianyan was very uneasy about the Tianyanhu who was left alone on the ground return ball, always worried that he would abuse his magic power to cause trouble to Xiangling and the others. Xiangling's heart softened and promised to keep the Tianyanhu at her home. Cone had to go back to the Sky Eye planet when something happened, so I had to entrust the naughty Sky Eye Tiger to Xiang Ling. Before Tianyan left, he secretly left a way for Tianyan Tiger to call himself: "Song of Tianyan" and dancing, Tianyan will rush back to the earth in time. Tianyanhu felt that he was the boss, and began to use magic to show off his skills. But although he is helpful, his magical power is limited, and he lost his mind when thinking about the problem. As a result, his magical power soon became the chief troublemaker, causing restlessness. Xiangling's parents did not realize that there was a new alien Tianhu in the family.(translated form douban)

title: Tianyan Shen Hu2
synopsis: season2 of it.

title: Tian Yanshen Niu
synopsis: Tianyan Shenniu is Tianyan’s classmate Niuniu on his own planet. He is a person who wants to be a superman and is more conscious of death in character. He always wanted to compete with the eyes of the sky in magic power, but apart from slightly better than the eyes of the sky in terms of power, his total magic power was still under the eyes of the sky, but he always dreamed of being a "superman" on earth. I heard that 2009 is the year of the ox, and people will respect the ox very much. The ox will become the family’s favorite animal and mascot, so he insisted on coming to the earth, believing that he will become the most popular character, but because of his consideration. The angle of is always different from that of ordinary people, and he always stubbornly believes that he must be right. Therefore, between this super "Kangtou" and Xiang Ling, a series of ridiculous stories also happened.(translated from douban)

title: Tian Yanshen Tu
synopsis: The summer vacation of Tianyan Planet is here again. The most troublesome student in the school Tianyan Rabbit is reluctant to make up lessons and slips to the earth for vacation. There was also the notorious Golden Fox of Skyeye Star quietly following the Divine Rabbit. Golden Fox wants to be one of the twelve beasts. However, the quality of others was too bad, so he repeatedly lost the election. This time the gaze rabbit is alone, and he thinks this is a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to eat the god rabbit, absorb the mana from it, and rank among the god beasts. Tianyan Rabbit is very courageous, but he likes to cause trouble. Do some destruction every day. The naughty rabbit created a lot of trouble as soon as it arrived on the earth, which made Xiangling and her friends dizzy. [1]  The picture quality of this work has been improved by leaps and bounds compared with the previous work. Tianyan has grown into a very handsome and handsome boy, and his hair has become short, and he is wearing a very graceful spacesuit. Xiangling is also less childish and more beautiful than the previous one. (translated from douban)

title: Tianyan Zhi Zhan
synopsis: Tianyan took blog posts, champions, Xiangling, and a beautiful party on a cosmic journey. By coincidence, he encountered a black hole and made an emergency landing on the destroyed planet-Kadios, a new type of planet with mysterious high-tech. And temporarily settled in the human camp—the homeland. However, there is no peace here. The "Homeland" alliance representing humans and the "Black Iron Base" representing rebel robots form a confrontation between the two camps in Cadios. Their victory or defeat determines the future destiny of Cadios. For this reason, Tianyan and his friends formed a task force to carry out this difficult task. In the end, the eyes of the sky lived up to the expectations, released the power of the eyes of the sky, defeated the Explosive Spirit King, and flew back to his homeland-the earth. (translated from douban)

title: Tianyan Guilai
synopsis: This film tells an interesting story between the alien boy Tianyan and Xiang Ling, Zhen Meili, Wu Guanjun, Xu Bowen, Zhang Shengnan and other good friends on earth. Tianyan is a sunny teenager with magical magical powers. He usually appears in front of his parents and teachers in the form of a pet cat "cone", but in the lives of Xiangling and his friends, he is an omnipotent "skyeye"— —He always shows up in time when his friends most need help, and uses his magic to solve their difficulties and realize their dreams! Although the children will make some ridiculous little situations from time to time due to their own personal shortcomings, under the positive and positive guidance of the eyes of the sky, everyone finally realizes a positive, enterprising, kind and honest attitude towards life.(translated from douban)

title: Congming Xiao Tianyan
synopsis: Tianyan is an alien boy. He used magic to help Xiang Ling and his friends solve many problems, but he also caused many jokes. The simple and kind children gather together, and the daily life full of happiness and laughter is performed every day. (translated from iqiyi)

title: A U
synopsis: A U is a kid next door, he is clever, clever, mischievous, has endless spooky ideas, countless funny things, and brings constant laughter. U's practical ability is far better than the ability to learn classroom knowledge. Ah U is caring, likes to help others, and at the same time loves to be public, likes to show the limelight, often kindly do bad things, often get embarrassed. Ah U has a group of super partners. Fat boy-U's super fan, honest and cute, but when he encounters food, he will burst out with amazing power. Amei-beautiful and cute, good grades, pursuit of perfection, is a role model for students. Man-in-law-she is impatient and easily agitated, but she is straightforward, full of responsibility and sense of justice. There is also a serious all-purpose teacher-Teacher A. In the study and family life, U and his friends have had countless funny things. In these things, U showed everyone his cleverness and nonsensicalness, and in various funny stories, they gained growth and shared the joy of growth.(translated form youku)

title: A U Zhi Shen Qihuan Jing
synopsis: The Doctor of Agriculture invented a super carrot, and he locked it in the nutrition cabin. But the careless doctor forgot the password to open the cabin. The radish cannot stay in the nutrition cabin for a long time, it must be taken out within 30 days. Another way to open the nutrition cabin is to complete the phantom mirror mission. Therefore, the doctor handed over this task to U and his friends Fat Tsai, A Mei and the man-in-law. But the three rabbits headed by Tu Fei had long been salivating on the turnips, and they snatched the phantom mirror. In order to open the nutrition cabin to get the carrot before the rabbit, the doctor gave U and the others another phantom mirror. The children and the rabbits opened the magic mirror and kept getting the task guidance: decrypt the pinyin of Chinese characters to get the location of the next task; search for the jigsaw puzzle to get the location of the next task; complete the English letter connection to get the location of the next task... The rabbits will make trouble when U is doing task analysis. U also relies on his own ingenuity to defeat the rabbit. As a result, a humorous competition was staged. (translated form youku)

title: A U De Fannao
synopsis: A U is a five-year-old child in Hangzhou, living with his parents and an intelligent robot Tuzhi. As he grows up day by day, Ah U finds that he has added a lot of troubles. His good friends-Pang Dongdong, Amei, and Lan Yinbo also have various problems and problems. They don't know how to manage their emotions, and they are not good at interacting with others. Even among partners, they sometimes have different opinions and small frictions. Teachers and moms and dads saw these troubles on the children and began to guide and educate them in various interesting ways. Sometimes Tuzhi would also use his wisdom to cooperate. In the end, under the guidance of parents and teachers, and the efforts of Ayou and his friends, these growing problems have been resolved.(translated from youku)

title: A You Zhi Tong Qu Xilie
synopsis: Tell interesting stories about elementary school student Ayou’s at school or at home. (translated form youku)

title: A U Zhi Mengxiang Xilie
synopsis: "A U's Dream Series" tells a series of warm little stories between U and his companions. What is reflected in the story is the spiritual temperament that all children possess: courage, love, self-denial, trust, and mutual help. What we have seen is the case of U, but we can feel the commonality between children's innocence and childlikeness, and we can see the big from the small. The images of children in this series of short films are cute, healthy, positive and full of truth, goodness and beauty. This film is a public welfare animation short, which is a fun and entertaining film, and conveys positive energy in laughter.(translated from youku)

title: A U Xue Kexue
synopsis: This film is an extension of the "A You" animation series, adapted from the "Science Literacy Reader for Primary School Students" published by Science Popularization Publishing House. It presents popular science knowledge to the audience with a humorous storyline, so that children can learn to think like a scientist . A group of children, mainly U, are curious about nature and social life, and they are actively exploring. Through the answers of teachers and parents, they have learned a lot of interesting scientific knowledge. The whole film is humorous and funny without losing a rigorous scientific attitude, allowing children to learn knowledge in laughter and truly entertaining. (translated from youku)
